Line.MultilineString: You arrive at the academy, one amongst a throng of other bright faced, hopeful applicants. An excited buzz of voices fills the air as you all wait for the instructor to arrive.
Finally a grizzled man makes his way out onto the dais at the front of the crowd.
He holds up his hand and bangs an ornate walking stick on the ground until the crowd becomes silent.
"Welcome all to Rosentier Royal Academy! Here you will learn what you need to know to survive in a life of adventuring."
"Once you graduate I guarantee that you will be able to handle anything this dangerous world can throw at you."
"So good luck, Train hard! And may the goddess look favourably upon you all!"
